section_title: AD HOC WORKING GROUP ON THE DURBAN PLATFORM FOR ENHANCED ACTION
sentences: The opening plenary of the second part of ADP 2 took place on 4 June with Jayant Moreshver Mauskar (India) and Harald Dovland (Norway) continuing as Co-Chairs.
The ADP s work was based on the agenda (FCCC/ADP/2013/AGENDA) adopted at the first part of ADP 2.
For a summary of the ADP opening statements, see: http://www.iisd.ca/vol12/enb12571e.html
